io.github.reggert.reb4j

Class AbstractExpression

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.reggert.reb4j.AbstractExpression
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Expression, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractAlternative, Adopted, Alternation, Sequence

    public abstract class AbstractExpression
extends Object
implements Expression
    Base implementation of Expression. This class provides the canonical implementations of toString() and toPattern().
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Pattern toPattern()
      Passes the regular expression represented by this object to Pattern and returns the result.
      String toString()
      Always returns the same value as Expression.expression().
